person.bio: Rafy is an Electrical Engineer with great passion in Computer Science, Currently working with TF-Chain team. Engineer fell in love with Threefold and I have same goals of giving freedom and control back to the people, and it has lots of bright minds I'm so proud to work/learn from them on daily basis.
person.excerpt: Rafy is an Electrical Engineer with great passion in Computer Science.
